comment:
Mr. President,

How many Americans have died under your watch from COVID-19?

Over 33,000 reported so far, and counting. That's 2X. 

If Biden/Obama was a disaster...

If Romney choked...

then you've swallowed.

#coronavirus 
#trump 
#biden 
#obama 
#romney 
#obamacare
